sentences.en: But most are indoor games, frequently what are called parlor games or party games.
sentences.cn: 但是大多数是室内游戏, 称为客厅或派对游戏.

sentences.en: Dave and Esau and Doris led me into the parlor.
sentences.cn: 戴夫、颐索和桃丽丝把我接进客厅.

sentences.en: I thought maybe Grandpa came over and sat around the den or parlor or whatever for years before he proposed.
sentences.cn: 我以前以为奶奶来到爷爷家，坐在私室或客厅或什么地方几年，然后爷爷才求婚的。

sentences.en: In the parlor, Collins quickly got his bearings.
sentences.cn: 柯林斯进入客厅后很快就辨认出了他所处的位置.

sentences.en: Leroy stole up the hall to the parlor.
sentences.cn: 勒罗伊偷偷穿过门厅走到客厅。

sentences.en: Mother told us to spruce the parlor for Christmas.
sentences.cn: 妈妈要我们把客厅收拾整洁过圣诞节.

sentences.en: On the wall of the parlor was splashed his certificate of merit.
sentences.cn: 在客厅的墙上高悬着他的奖状.

sentences.en: One day, she said, as she was leaving the priest’s parlor, he pulled her aside for a passionate kiss.
sentences.cn: 她说，一天，在她离开那位牧师的客厅时，他把她拉到一边，激情地吻了她。

sentences.en: Rhett rose swiftly , deposited Wade in Fanny's lap, and went into the parlor.
sentences.cn: 瑞德连忙站起身来, 把小韦德放在范妮膝头上, 走进客厅.

sentences.en: She had a facial at the beauty parlor.
sentences.cn: 她在美容院做了一次美容.

sentences.en: She was lying on a small settee in the parlor.
sentences.cn: 她躺在客厅的一张小长椅上.

sentences.en: The light of the cheerful fire shone on the rug and carpet of a cosy parlor.
sentences.cn: 在一间暖和的客厅里,熊熊的炉火映射在地毯上.

sentences.en: The parlor has to be spiffed up a bit before the guests arrive.
sentences.cn: 客人们来到之前,得把客厅搞得整洁一点.

sentences.en: They were conversing in the parlor.
Two minute ground - floor rooms served as kitchen, and parlor, used for company.
sentences.cn: 里面一楼有两间很小的屋子用作厨房, 还有一间会客厅用于大家聚会.

sentences.en: What they lacked in parlor grace they made up for in determination.
sentences.cn: 他们优雅的风度不足,却有一股子愣劲.

words.tran_cn: 负责餐桌侍候和应门等的的客厅女仆

phrases.tran_cn: n. 按摩院；（挂按摩院招牌的）妓院

trans.tran_cn: 客厅，起居室，（旅馆中的）休息室，<美>（通常用来构成合成词）店
